heroTitle2: Classes for Dance, Salsa, Bachata, Urban Dance, and More
heroTagline: Dancing is working on your happiness.
heroValue: You don't need more dance classes. You need the right classes. If you're looking for dance classes in Barcelona where you finally make progress and don't feel like just a number, you're in the right place. With the Farray Method® you learn well, fast and with style… and you have more fun than in any gym.
philosophyIntro: Dancing is working on your happiness.
philosophyBody1: No effort will bring you more benefits than learning and practicing a dance. The endorphins you produce while dancing generate an immediate increase in serotonin, and with it, your level of well-being. When you dance, you smile more, you like yourself more, you are more sociable, more flexible, and more understanding. If there is one thing capable of changing your life from the very first moment, it is, without a doubt, dancing.
philosophyBody2: More than a conventional dance school, what Yunaisy Farray and her team offer is a center that reflects their artistic ideals and way of life. The activities at Farray's International Dance Center are distinguished by following an exclusive and unique method created by Yunaisy Farray, which ensures fast, solid, and proven results.
philosophyQuote: The noblest art is that of making others happy.
happinessStoryLine1: Some people are looking for a dance school similar to the ones they already know, and there's nothing wrong with that.
happinessStoryLine2: And some people are searching for the school they've always dreamed of.
happinessStoryLine3: At Farray's, we belong to this second group.
happinessStoryLine4Part1: But since this school didn't exist yet in Barcelona,
happinessStoryLine4Part2: we decided to create it. And it's working.
happinessStoryLine5: Because we didn't know it was impossible, we just did it.
happinessStoryPara1Part1: We knew nothing about "the impossible". So we simply did it. Because our center wasn't born from a business plan.
happinessStoryPara1Part2: It was born from a dream.
happinessStoryPara3Part3: , a sports and training center recognized by
happinessStoryPara3Part7: —dancer, international master teacher, and our driving force—where every student matters, every story counts, and every moment brings you closer to the best version of yourself.
happinessStoryPara4: A place we didn't copy from anywhere. A place that didn't exist… until we built it.
heroPosterAlt: Dancers practicing Cuban salsa at the Farray International Dance Center Barcelona dance school
classesIntro: Discover our dance classes for adults and find the perfect style for you. Quality, professionalism, and community in the heart of Barcelona, at an academy accredited by CID-UNESCO.
classCatLatinDesc: Learn to dance in pairs with authentic Cuban technique. From Cuban salsa and timba to sensual bachata, our teachers trained at Cuba's National School of Arts will teach you to connect with your partner, master Latin rhythm, and enjoy Caribbean music. Groups separated by real levels: beginner, intermediate, and advanced.
classCatUrbanDesc: Feel the street energy with Hip Hop, Dancehall, Reggaeton, Afrobeat, K-Pop, and Commercial Dance. Learn music video choreography, authentic urban technique, flow, and stage presence. Styles for all levels: from beginner to advanced. Perfect for those seeking expression, current music, and urban culture.
classCatContemporaryDesc: Explore classical technique and contemporary expression with Classical Ballet, Contemporary Dance, Modern Jazz, Afro-Jazz, and Afro-Contemporary. Develop your technique, flexibility, musicality, and artistic expression. Classes adapted to all levels with teachers trained at prestigious Cuban schools internationally recognized.
classCatFitnessDesc: Improve your strength, flexibility, endurance, and body control with classes specifically designed for dancers. Includes Bum Bum Glutes, Stretching, Pilates, Body Conditioning, and Dance Barre. Functional training that complements your dance practice, prevents injuries, and enhances your performance in any style.
classCatMorningDesc: Start your day with energy and movement. We offer Contemporary Dance, Afro-Jazz, Sexy Reggaeton, and Sexy Style classes in the morning (10am-2pm). Ideal for students, professionals with flexible schedules, or those who prefer to train before noon. Small groups and motivating atmosphere.
classCatWorldDesc: Travel the world through dance: Kizomba, Semba, and Kompa (African dances), Flamenco and Sevillanas (Spanish tradition), Pole Dance, Aerial Silks, and Acro-Yoga (aerial and acrobatic disciplines). Discover unique styles, expand your movement vocabulary, and explore new cultures through dance.
whyTitle: The FIDC Difference: Why choose our dance school in Barcelona?
whyPillar1Content: Learn with internationally recognized Cuban masters with extensive experience and teaching quality that accelerates your learning.
whyPillar2Content: Learn with a teaching system created by Yunaisy Farray our Cuban teacher, ensuring fast, solid, and proven results.
whyPillar3Content: Enjoy 700 m² of first-class facilities, with spacious dance studios, professional equipment, and air conditioning for your maximum comfort.
whyPillar4Content: Join an international family. Enjoy leisure activities and regular practice sessions to socialize and perfect what you've learned.
whyPillar5Content: We adapt dance to your life. We offer a wide variety of schedules, including morning classes and intensive programs, so you can always find your moment to dance.
whyPillar6Content: CID-UNESCO member center that collaborates on major TV projects and live shows. A seal of international quality.
whyPillar7Content: We are located in the heart of Barcelona, just a 5-minute walk from Plaza España and Sants Station.
servicesTitle: Much More Than a Dance School
servicesIntro: At Farray's International Dance Center, we offer much more than just dance classes. Discover all the services we provide to help you create, celebrate, and grow through dancing.
serviceRentalDesc: Spacious and equipped studios for rehearsals, classes, and private events in the heart of Barcelona.
servicePhotoDesc: Your art deserves a stage. Rent our studios for audiovisual productions or professional photoshoots.
servicePartiesDesc: Celebrate your birthday or bachelorette party by dancing with your group in a fun and original experience.
servicePrivateDesc: Personalized training at your own pace and level, individually or in a group, at the academy or at your home.
serviceAgencyDesc: Hire professional dancers and choreographers for events, music videos, or shows.
serviceCorporateDesc: We create team-building and wellness experiences through dance. Perfect for motivating and connecting teams.
serviceGiftDesc: Surprise someone with a unique gift: an unforgettable dance experience to enjoy or share.
serviceEventsDesc: We organize professional and spectacular dance events. From showcases to corporate events with our dancers.
serviceMerchandisingDesc: Exclusive Farray's Center products. Clothing, accessories and dance items with the quality seal of our academy.
classesFaqQ1: How many dance styles do you teach at Farray's Center?
classesFaqA1: We offer training in over 25 different dance styles. Our catalog includes Latin dances (salsa, bachata, kizomba), urban dance (hip hop, dancehall, afrobeats, reggaeton), classical styles (ballet, contemporary, jazz), and specializations like physical preparation for dancers. This variety allows you to explore different styles and find those that resonate most with you, or specialize in one while complementing with others.
classesFaqQ2: Can I take classes in different styles at the same time?
classesFaqA2: Of course! In fact, we recommend it. Learning multiple dance styles makes you a more complete and versatile dancer. For example, ballet improves your posture and technique for salsa, while hip hop can make your bachata more dynamic. Our class packages allow you to attend different types of classes according to your interests. Many of our most advanced students practice 3-4 styles simultaneously.
classesFaqQ3: How do I know which level is right for me?
classesFaqA3: If it's your first class, we always recommend starting at the fundamentals or beginner level. However, if you have previous dance experience, our instructors can assess you in your first welcome class and recommend the most appropriate level. You can also try an intermediate level class if you feel the fundamentals are too basic. The important thing is that you feel challenged but not overwhelmed.
classesFaqQ4: How often should I attend classes to see progress?
classesFaqA4: For consistent and noticeable progress, we recommend attending at least twice a week. At this frequency, most students see significant improvements in 2-3 months. If you can attend 3-4 times a week, progress will be even faster. However, even a weekly class will allow you to advance, albeit at a more gradual pace. Consistency is more important than intensity.
classesFaqQ5: Do you offer private or only group classes?
classesFaqA5: We offer both options. Group classes are excellent for learning in community, making friends, and benefiting from the group's energy. Private classes are ideal if you seek personalized attention, have specific goals (like preparing for a presentation or wedding), or prefer a more flexible schedule. Many students combine both: regular group classes supplemented with occasional private sessions to work on specific aspects.

home_categories_todas_intro: Explore our complete catalog with over 25 dance styles. From classical ballet to urban dances, find the perfect class for you.
classesFaqQ9: Where are the dance classes located in Barcelona?
classesFaqA9: We are in the heart of Barcelona, near Plaça Catalunya, with direct access from Metro L1 (Sant Antoni / Universitat) and L2 (Universitat). Our exact address is Carrer de Floridablanca 135, Barcelona. Very accessible from the neighborhoods of Raval, Eixample, Gràcia, Sant Antoni and Ciutat Vella. Professional facilities with spacious rooms, dance floor and all the necessary equipment.
classesFaqQ6: Where is Farray's Center located and how do I get there?
classesFaqA6: We are located at Calle Entença 100, Barcelona 08015, in the Sants neighborhood. We are easily accessible by metro (L3/L5 - Sants Estació, L1 - Hostafrancs), bus (lines 27, 43, 78, 109, H10), or Renfe Cercanías (Sants Station). The studio is just a 5-7 minute walk from Sants station. There is also public parking nearby if you come by car.
classesFaqA7: We have classes from Monday to Friday in morning (10:00-14:00), afternoon (18:00-20:00), and evening (20:00-23:00) time slots. We also offer classes on Saturdays. Schedules vary depending on style and level. We recommend visiting the specific page for each style to see detailed schedules, or contact us directly to find the classes that best fit your availability.
classesFaqQ8: Do I need previous experience to start?
classesFaqA8: No, you absolutely don't need previous experience. All our dance styles have classes for absolute beginners. Our teachers specialize in teaching from scratch and creating a welcoming environment for new students. Many of our most advanced students started with no dance experience whatsoever.

homev2_metaDescription: Dance school in Barcelona with salsa, bachata and dance classes for adults. CID-UNESCO Center with 4.9/5 on Google. Book your welcome class. Book now.
homev2_heroHeadline:
You don't need more dance classes.
You need the right classes.
homev2_heroSubheadline: The Farray Method® is the only dance teaching system registered with UNESCO that tracks your progress class by class.
homev2_heroTagline: Dancing is working on your happiness. But only if you truly progress.
homev2_heroValue: In Barcelona there are dozens of dance schools. Some have good teachers. Others have a great atmosphere. But almost none can answer this: "What level am I at and what do I need for the next one?" We can.
homev2_heroCta1Subtext: Welcome assessment in your first class
homev2_founderTitle: Behind every class there's a story. This is mine.
homev2_founderPara1: From Cuba's National School of Arts to Barcelona. Over 20 years training dancers who today shine on stages around the world.
homev2_founderPara2: Creator of the Farray Method®, registered with CID-UNESCO. I don't teach random steps. I teach you to feel the music and express it with your body.
homev2_founderPara3: I've appeared in "Street Dance 2", "Got Talent" and "The Dancer". But my greatest pride isn't on screen: it's the hundreds of students who came in knowing nothing and today dance amazingly.
homev2_founderQuote: The noblest art is to make others happy.
homev2_methodProblemTitle: Why 87% of people quit dance classes... and how to avoid it
homev2_methodProblemText: Most schools give you random steps. You memorize, get frustrated, and think "I'm not cut out for dancing". The problem isn't you. It's the method.
homev2_methodPillar1Desc: Russian technique + Cuban heritage. Every movement has a reason. Every class takes you to the next level.
homev2_methodPillar2Desc: It's not enough to do the steps. We teach you to feel the music, to interpret each rhythm, to dance with your soul.
homev2_methodPillar3Desc: Fusion of styles and cultures. The best of Cuba, Africa, USA and Europe in a unique method.
homev2_methodResult: In 8 weeks you dance confidently. Not because we say so, but because the method is designed for it.
homev2_comparisonTitle: What other academies don't tell you
homev2_comparisonSubtitle: We don't bad-mouth anyone. We just lay out the facts. You decide.
homev2_comparisonDisclaimer: We're not saying other schools are bad. We're saying our approach is different.
homev2_compRow2Others: You attend class, but are you progressing?

homev2_pricingTitle: Start this week. The method works from day one.
homev2_pricingUrgency: Small groups. When a level fills up, we open a waiting list.
homev2_faq1Q: I have no experience, can I start?
homev2_faq1A: Of course. We have levels for absolute beginners. 80% of our students started with no previous experience.
homev2_faq2Q: Am I too old/young to dance?
homev2_faq2A: Our students range from 18 to 70+ years. Dance knows no age, only desire.
homev2_faq3Q: How long will it take me to dance well?
homev2_faq3A: Con el Farray Method®, en 8 semanas notarás una diferencia significativa. En 6 meses, danceás with confidence.
homev2_faq4Q: What happens if I miss a class?
homev2_faq4A: You can make up classes in other schedules of the same level. Total flexibility.
homev2_faq5Q: Do I need a partner for salsa classes?
homev2_faq5A: No. In our classes we rotate constantly. Whether you come alone or accompanied, you'll dance with everyone.
homev2_finalCtaTitle1: We don't promise to be the best school in Barcelona.
homev2_finalCtaTitle2: We promise something more useful: results.
homev2_finalCtaSubtitle1: Thousands of people dance amazingly today.
homev2_finalCtaSubtitle2: They started just like you: doubting.
homev2_finalCtaSubtitle3: The only difference is they took the first step.
homev2_finalCtaTrust: No commitment. No surprises. Just dance.
homev2_classes_subtitle: Over 25 different styles. From salsa and bachata to urban dances, ballet and contemporary. All levels.
homev2_services_subtitle: Room rental, private classes, parties, corporate events and more. Everything you need under one roof.
homev2_interrupt1:
80% of people who sign up for dance quit in the first 3 months.
It's not that they're not cut out for dancing. It's that they chose the wrong place to learn.
homev2_interrupt2:
Fun fact: In Cuba there are no "open level" dance schools.
They know that mixing levels doesn't work. We know it too.
homev2_interrupt3:
Uncomfortable question:
How long have you been dancing "the same thing" because nobody told you how to progress?
homev2_interrupt4:
The difference between a good school and an excellent one
isn't in what they promise you. It's in what you can measure.
homev2_interrupt5:
Spoiler: Not everyone fits here.
If you're looking to "just have fun", there are cheaper options.
If you're looking to transform yourself through dance, keep reading.
homev2_interrupt6:
One last thing:
We're not selling you anything.
We're showing you an option.
The decision is yours. It always has been.
